comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/572>#572</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
Confirmed <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/pull/577>#577</denchmark-link> is going to fix this. Add test cases to ensure that there is no correctness bugs later.
